please follow the guidelines for adding issues https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/contributing.md
and use the template so we can get the details we need https://raw.github.com/owncloud/core/master/issue_template.md

sorry. i did not know any better.

### expected behaviour
";" in the file or directory name if there is, can not be successfully downloaded.
corrupted compressed file is downloaded.

### actual behaviour
i want to download the correct file name, such as "foo;bar.txt".

### steps to reproduce
1. upload "foo;bar.txt".
2. try to download this file.
3. files can be downloaded are compressed, it can not be decompressed.

### server configuration
operating system: 
ubuntu12.04lts

web server: 
apache/2.2.22

database:
mysql 5.5.29

php version:
php 5.3.10

owncloud version:
owncloud 4.5.7 

### client configuration
browser:
ie 9
ff 18.02
chrome　25.0.1364.152 m

operating system:
windows7 ｘ64

### logs
#### web server error log
```
[thu mar 07 13:29:15 2013] [error] [client ***.***.***.***] php warning:  filesize(): stat failed for /datapath/foo in /var/www/owncloud/lib/filestorage/local.php on line 54, referer: https://url/index.php
[thu mar 07 13:29:15 2013] [error] [client ***.***.***.***] php warning:  filesize(): stat failed for /datapath/bar.txt in /var/www/owncloud/lib/filestorage/local.php on line 54, referer: https:/url/index.php
```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
nothing
```

#### browser log
```
resource interpreted as document but transferred with mime type application/zip: "https://url/?app=files&getfile=ajax/download.php&files=foo%3bbar.txt&dir=%2f".
```
